question: a man took a loan from a bank at the rate of 10 % p . a . simple interest . after 3 years he had to pay rs . 5400 interest only for the period . the principal amount borrowed by him was :

the total surface area of a cuboid length 12 m , breadth 10 m and height 8 m .
ratio between length and breath of a rectangle is 25 : 16 . the area of the rectangle is same with a square whose side is 200 . find the breadth and length of the rectangle ?

a certain car uses 12 gallons of gasoline in traveling 360 miles . in order for the car to travel the same distance using 10 gallons of gasoline , by how many miles per gallon must the car ’ s gas mileage be increased ?
the expression x # y denotes the product of the consecutive multiples of 3 between x and y , inclusive . what is the sum of the exponents in the prime factorization of 21 # 30 ?

if the height of a cone is increased by 160 % then its volume is increased by ?
if the population of a certain country increases at the rate of two person every 60 seconds , by how many persons does the population increase in 100 minutes ?
a man sold 18 toys for rs . 25200 , gaining thereby the cost price of 3 toy find the cost price of a toy
a man is 26 years older than his studen . in two years , his age will be twice the age of his student . the present age of his student is :
if 20 men can build a wall 66 metres long in 10 days , what length of a similar can be built by 86 men in 8 days ?

a hat company ships its hats , individually wrapped , in 8 - inch by 10 - inch by 12 - inch boxes . each hat is valued at $ 5.50 . if the company ’ s latest order required a truck with at least 288,000 cubic inches of storage space in which to ship the hats in their boxes , what was the minimum value of the order ?
the positive numbers w , x , y , and z are such that x is 10 percent greater than y , y is 20 percent greater than z , and w is 20 percent less than x . what percent greater than z is w ?
in 70 liters of a mixture of milk and water , the quantity of water is 10 % . how much water should be added so that new mixture may 25 % water .
three pipes of same capacity can fill a tank in 8 hours . if there are only two pipes of same capacity , the tank can be filled in .
if 7 spiders make 7 webs in 7 days , then 1 spider will make 1 web in how many days ?
a rectangular field is to be fenced on three sides leaving a side of 20 feet uncovered . if the area of the field is 680 sq . feet , how many feet of fencing will be required ?
what is the sum of natural numbers between 50 and 100
what is the units digit of 2222 ^ ( 333 ) * 3333 ^ ( 222 ) ?
what is 15 percent of 68 ?

at a certain company , each employee has a salary grade s that is at least 1 and at most 5 . each employee receives an hourly wage p , in dollars , determined by the formula p = 8.50 + 0.25 ( s – 1 ) . an employee with a salary grade of 5 receives how many more dollars per hour than an employee with a salary grade of 1 ?

set a of 8 positive integers may have the same element and have 36 . and set b of 8 positive integers must have different elements and have 36 . when m and n are the greatest possible differences between 36 and other elements ’ sums in set a and set b , respectively , m - n = ?
to asphalt 1 km road , 30 men spent 12 days working 8 hours per day . how many days , 20 men will spend to asphalt a road of 2 km working 14 hours a day ?
calculate the effect changes in dimension of a rectangle will have on its area , if length is increased by 20 % and its breadth is decreased by 5 % ?
a certain taxi company charges $ 3.00 for the first 1 / 5 of a mile plus $ 0.40 for each additional 1 / 5 of a mile . what would this company charge for a taxi ride that was 8 miles long ?
there are 8 books on a shelf , of which 2 are paperbacks and 6 are hardbacks . how many possible selections of 3 books from this shelf include at least one paperback ?
anand and deepak started a business investing rs . 2250 and rs . 3200 respectively . out of a total profit of rs . 1380 , deepak ' s share is :
a tank is filled by 3 pipes a , b , c in 7 hours . pipe c is twice as fast as b and b is twice as fast as a . how much will pipe a alone take to fill the tank ?

a camera lens filter kit containing 5 filters sells for $ 57.50 . if the filters are purchased individually , 2 of them are priced at $ 10.45 each , 2 at $ 12.05 each , 1 at $ 17.50 . the amount saved by purchasing the kit is what percent of the total price of the 5 filters purchased individually ?
a is twice as fast as b . if b alone can do a piece of work in 18 days , in what time can a and b together complete the work ?
in a certain company 20 % of the men and 40 % of the women attended the annual company picnic . if 35 % of all the employees are men . what % of all the employee went to the picnic ?

8 business executives and 7 chairmen meet at a conference . if each business executive shakes the hand of every other business executive and every chairman once , and each chairman shakes the hand of each of the business executives but not the other chairmen , how many handshakes would take place ?
in a renowned city , the average birth rate is 6 people every two seconds and the death rate is 2 people every two seconds . estimate the size of the population net increase that occurs in one day .
what sum of money will produce rs . 210 as simple interest in 4 years at 3 1 / 2 percent ?
the difference between the local value and face value of 7 in the numeral 657903 is :

there are 11 teams in a certain league and each team plays each of the other teams exactly once . what is the total number of games played ?
two numbers n and 16 have lcm = 48 and gcf = 8 . find n .
a side of beef lost 20 percent of its weight in processing . if the side of beef weighed 640 pounds after processing , how many pounds did it weigh before processing ?

when positive integer x is divided by positive integer y , the remainder is 5 . if x / y = 96.2 , what is the value of y ?
in town x , 65 percent of the population are employed , and 48 percent of the population are employed males . what percent of the employed people in town x are females ?

a certain pair of used shoes can be repaired for $ 14.50 and will last for 1 year . a pair of the same kind of shoes can be purchased new for $ 32.00 and will last for 2 years . the average cost per year of the new shoes is what percent greater than the cost of repairing the used shoes ?
a man ' s speed with the current is 15 km / hr and the speed of the current is 2.5 km / hr . the man ' s speed against the current is ?
